movie.title: A Little Chaos
movie.writer: Jeremy Brock, Alison Deegan, Alan Rickman
movie.actors: Kate Winslet, Matthias Schoenaerts, Stanley Tucci, Alan Rickman
movie.plot: A romantic drama following Sabine, a talented landscape designer, who is building a garden at Versailles for King Louis XIV. Sabine struggles with class barriers as she becomes romantically entangled with the court's renowned landscape artist.
